Description.Text: Renion Residence Hotel is a friendly 4-star hotel offering spacious accommodation near the heart of Almaty. Highlights include onsite dining, a sauna, a gym, and free Wi-Fi and parking. Almaty is a major financial and cultural centre of Central Asia and is surrounded by snow-capped mountains. Nearby places of interest include the Military History Museum, Panfilov Park and Zenkov's Cathedral. Zhibek Zholy metro station provides fast and easy access to other popular Almaty destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property with a classic interior. Facilities include a sauna and a gym. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Suites are 62sqm and decorated in a bright, classic style with dark wood furniture. They comprise a spacious bedroom, dressing room, well-equipped kitchen and separate living room. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player, mini-bar and safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. The Uno restaurant offers regional and European dishes in a relaxed and friendly setting, while guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the stylish hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers a chargeable airport shuttle service.
